#include<stdio.h>
#include<string.h>
int main()
{ char c[]={'*','v','x','s','w','d','f','g','u','h','j','k','n','b','i','o','*','e','a','r','y','c','q','z','t','*'};
  char a[1000]={'\0'},b[1000]={'\0'};
  long long int i,j,k,l;
  scanf("%s",a);
  l=strlen(a);
  j=0;
  for(i=0;i<l;i=i+1)
  { if(a[i]>='a' && a[i]<='z')
    { if(a[i]!='a' && a[i]!='z' && a[i]!='q')
      { b[j]=c[(a[i]-'a')];
        j=j+1;
      }
    }
    else if(a[i]>='A' && a[i]<='Z')
     { if(a[i]!='A' && a[i]!='Z' && a[i]!='Q')
        { b[j]=((c[(a[i]-'A')]-'a')+'A');
          j=j+1;
        }
     }
 }
  printf("%s\n",b);
 return 0;
}
